room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the Wild West Room and adored it! The puzzles were challenging but not impossible. I loved the decor and ambient music. The theming was amazing, it really felt like we were outlaws in the Wild West. The staff was awesome. Ammon was very friendly and helpful. Adrienne gave wonderful hints. We will definitely be back to PanIQ

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Ammon was our host!! And he was phenomenal. Went in with a group of 6 for my sisters birthday and we had a blast! Ammon was very polite and funny, will definitely be coming back to try the other rooms. We did the wild Wild West it was pretty hard, and we may not have made it out without the hints we asked for! But overall a fantastic experience! AMMON IS AMAZING!

room_title: Escape room "Wild West" by PanIQ Escape Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Did the Wild West Escape Room today. Great fun and really well thought out room. Would highly recommend it.
